name: dream-ball
effect: Can only be used in Entree Forest, to catch Pokémon encountered in the Dream World. Used in battle : Catches a wild Pokémon without fail.
short_effect: Catches Pokémon found in the Dream World.

flavor_text.black_white: A special Poké Ball that appears out of nowhere in a bag at the Entree Forest. It can catch any Pokémon.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A special Poké Ball that appears out of nowhere in a bag at the Entree Forest. It can catch any Pokémon.
